item.description:
Abstract/Agenda:
With the recent announcement of Telerik and DotNetNuke forming a strategic partnership, which grants DNN developers the opportunity to work with the Telerik ASP.NET Ajax controls, there are a lot of questions regarding these controls and how they work with DNN. In this presentation DNN veterans and newcomers alike will get a more in-depth look at a few of the controls offered in the ASP.NET Ajax suite and their integration with DNN.

Bio:
Carl Bergenhem is a Developer Support Specialist at Telerik where he works with their ASP.NET Ajax, Silverlight, and WPF controls as well as their Reporting, OpenAccess ORM, JustCode, and WebUI Test Studio tools. Among these products he specializes mainly in the ASP.NET Ajax, OpenAccess ORM and WebUI Test Studio products. Telerik is a leading provider of development tools and user interface components for the .NET framework and they strive to provide developers with the tools needed to make their life as easy as possible.
item.name: DNN Boston User Group
